title: Best Labor Day Furniture Sales So Far—Save Up To 70%
description: Shop Labor Day furniture sales and save up to 70% at major brands like Wayfair, Frontgate and Pottery Barn.
content:
Whether you’ve been eyeing a new sofa for your living room or plotting a major dining room upgrade ahead of holiday hosting, long weekends—like Labor Day weekend—are a great time to shop sales. We’re still a couple weeks out from the official holiday, but many of our favorite brands have already launched early Labor Day furniture sales—and the markdowns are steep. This weekend, you can save up to 70% from popular retailers including Wayfair, CB2 and more.

Between the back-to-school season, end-of-summer sales and early Labor Day offers, there are plenty of great deals to shop right now. Some retailers may save their best offers for the official holiday weekend, but if you’re headed out of town or simply want to beat the shopping rush, we’ve spotted some strong early offers. Below, find the best Labor Day furniture sales overall followed by a selection of the best deals organized by room.
• Wayfair: Take advantage of Wayfair’s furniture sales to save up to 80% on outdoor, living room, bedroom and dining room furniture.
• Pottery Barn: Save up to 60% on Pottery Barn furniture, outdoor pieces, bedding and more.
• Frontgate: Frontgate—the brand behind some of our favorite outdoor furniture—is offering up to 70% off its designs.
• West Elm: Get up to 50% off outdoor furniture and up to 60% off clearance items like room décor, bedding and couches.
• CB2: Browse through over a thousand sale items and save up to 60% on furniture that match a variety of home aesthetics.
• Serena & Lily: Right now, take up to 57% off indoor and outdoor furniture.
• Castlery: Shop Castlery’s Labor Day Early Access Sale and save up to $500. Plus, get an additional $80 off your order of $1,500 or more with code PRELD25.
• AllModern: Score up to 50% off mod pieces, including sectionals, dining chairs and more.
• Raymour & Flanigan: Score up to 30% off furniture staples during the retailer’s Labor Day sale.
summary: Many of our favorite brands, including Wayfair, Pottery Barn, and West Elm, have already launched early Labor Day furniture sales, offering discounts of up to 70% from popular retailers. While some retailers may save their best offers for the official holiday weekend, these retailers are offering significant discounts. The best Labor Day deals are organized by room by room, with discounts ranging from up to 60% to up to 80% on outdoor, living room, bedroom, and dining room furniture. Other brands offering discounts include Frontgate, AllModern, and Serena & Lily.
shortSummary: The best early Labor Day furniture sales are available, offering significant discounts like Wayfair, CB2, and even Pottery Barn, all at significant discounts.
